item.title: ‘Dark Winds’ Executive Producers Pay Tribute to Robert Redford and His Last Onscreen Role: “His Rebellious Spirit and Leadership Has Opened Doors”
item.description: The veteran producer and actor, who died Sept. 16, was a driving force behind the AMC series “he had been developing for almost 40 years.”
